text: Ignacio López may refer to: * Saint Ignatius of Loyola (Íñigo Oñaz López de Loyola, 1491–1556), founder of the Society of Jesus (Jesuits) * Ignacio López Rayón (1773–1832), leader of the revolutionary government, during the Mexican War of Independence * Ignacio López Iglesias (born 1987), Spanish footballer * Nacho López (1923–1986), Mexican photojournalist
title: Ignacio López
